name: Bad Gas
description:
Bad Gas is a merge of Doodle Jump and Fez mechanics. Bad Gas was created during a 1 Week Game Jam

You are a magic man and your goal in life is to jump higher than anyone has before. Your family and friends doubted your dream and have always attempted to put you off from achieving them. This is all because they are JEALOUS! PROVE THEM WRONG AND JUMP! JUMP!!!!!!!

Collaborators:
